service.description: Create a Postal Address (and the corresponding ContactMech record). If partyId and contactMechPurposeId are also passed will create a PartyContactMech record.

Update a Postal Address for a Party. PostalAddress is immutable, so this creates a new one and associates it with the Party, expiring the old associations (PartyContactMech records).
If a contactMechPurposeId is passed in it will only update for that purpose, otherwise it will update for all purposes.
NOTE: if you want to update the ContactMech.paymentFraudEvidenceId or .trustLevelEnumId fields, do so directly on the ContactMech entity (do not use this service).

log.message: No fields were different for Postal Address with ID [${contactMechId}], not updating.

return.message: Postal Address with ID [${contactMechId}] is not associated with party ID [${partyId}] and purpose [${contactMechPurposeId?:'N/A'}], not updating.
